This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 8, 9 and 10.

MicroPlayer is a sleek new systemwide music player working with Spotify, Apple Music, soundcloud plus many many more

Looks great & shows off the current songs album art!
Use Swipes to control your music!
Swipe up for additional song information!
Place anywhere on your homescreen!

Controls:
2 finger touch to move player
Hold to open your default or now playing music app
Swipe up for detailed view.
Swipe down to hide detailed view
Drag right for previous song
Drag left for next song
Tap to play/pause
Tap forward button for next song
Hold forward button to fast forward
Tap back button for previous song
Hold back button to rewind

Configure options from Settings.
